       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="set-team-access-restrictions" class="pt-3"> <a href="#set-team-access-restrictions">Set team access restrictions</a> </h3> 
         <p>Protected branches are available in public repositories with GitHub Free and GitHub Free for organizations, and in public and private repositories with GitHub Pro, GitHub Team, GitHub Enterprise Cloud, and GitHub Enterprise Server. For more information, see <a href="https://help.github.com/github/getting-started-with-github/githubs-products">GitHub's products</a> in the GitHub Help documentation.</p> 
         <p>Replaces the list of teams that have push access to this branch. This removes all teams that previously had push access and grants push access to the new list of teams. Team restrictions include child teams.</p> 
         <table>
          <thead>
           <tr>
            <th>Type</th>
            <th>Description</th>
           </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody>
           <tr>
            <td><code>array</code></td>
            <td>The teams that can have push access. Use the team's <code>slug</code>. <strong>Note</strong>: The list of users, apps, and teams in total is limited to 100 items.</td>
           </tr>
          </tbody>
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">put</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/branches/{branch}/protection/restrictions/teams</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="set-team-access-restrictions--parameters"> <a href="#set-team-access-restrictions--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4>

        <div> 
         <h3 id="remove-team-access-restrictions" class="pt-3"> <a href="#remove-team-access-restrictions">Remove team access restrictions</a> </h3> 
         <p>Protected branches are available in public repositories with GitHub Free and GitHub Free for organizations, and in public and private repositories with GitHub Pro, GitHub Team, GitHub Enterprise Cloud, and GitHub Enterprise Server. For more information, see <a href="https://help.github.com/github/getting-started-with-github/githubs-products">GitHub's products</a> in the GitHub Help documentation.</p> 
         <p>Removes the ability of a team to push to this branch. You can also remove push access for child teams.</p> 
         <table>
          <thead>
           <tr>
            <th>Type</th>
            <th>Description</th>
           </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody>
           <tr>
            <td><code>array</code></td>
            <td>Teams that should no longer have push access. Use the team's <code>slug</code>. <strong>Note</strong>: The list of users, apps, and teams in total is limited to 100 items.</td>
           </tr>
          </tbody>
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">delete</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/branches/{branch}/protection/restrictions/teams</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="remove-team-access-restrictions--parameters"> <a href="#remove-team-access-restrictions--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>branch</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>The name of the branch.</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>teams</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">array of strings</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p><strong>Required</strong>. teams parameter</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table>

         <h3 id="get-users-with-access-to-the-protected-branch" class="pt-3"> <a href="#get-users-with-access-to-the-protected-branch">Get users with access to the protected branch</a> </h3> 
         <p>Protected branches are available in public repositories with GitHub Free and GitHub Free for organizations, and in public and private repositories with GitHub Pro, GitHub Team, GitHub Enterprise Cloud, and GitHub Enterprise Server. For more information, see <a href="https://help.github.com/github/getting-started-with-github/githubs-products">GitHub's products</a> in the GitHub Help documentation.</p> 
         <p>Lists the people who have push access to this branch.</p> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">get</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/branches/{branch}/protection/restrictions/users</code></pre> 
        <div>

        <div> 
         <h3 id="add-user-access-restrictions" class="pt-3"> <a href="#add-user-access-restrictions">Add user access restrictions</a> </h3> 
         <p>Protected branches are available in public repositories with GitHub Free and GitHub Free for organizations, and in public and private repositories with GitHub Pro, GitHub Team, GitHub Enterprise Cloud, and GitHub Enterprise Server. For more information, see <a href="https://help.github.com/github/getting-started-with-github/githubs-products">GitHub's products</a> in the GitHub Help documentation.</p> 
         <p>Grants the specified people push access for this branch.</p> 
         <table>
          <thead>
           <tr>
            <th>Type</th>
            <th>Description</th>
           </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody>
           <tr>
            <td><code>array</code></td>
            <td>Usernames for people who can have push access. <strong>Note</strong>: The list of users, apps, and teams in total is limited to 100 items.</td>
           </tr>
          </tbody>
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">post</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/branches/{branch}/protection/restrictions/users</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="add-user-access-restrictions--parameters"> <a href="#add-user-access-restrictions--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr>

            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td>

        <div> 
         <h3 id="set-user-access-restrictions" class="pt-3"> <a href="#set-user-access-restrictions">Set user access restrictions</a> </h3> 
         <p>Protected branches are available in public repositories with GitHub Free and GitHub Free for organizations, and in public and private repositories with GitHub Pro, GitHub Team, GitHub Enterprise Cloud, and GitHub Enterprise Server. For more information, see <a href="https://help.github.com/github/getting-started-with-github/githubs-products">GitHub's products</a> in the GitHub Help documentation.</p> 
         <p>Replaces the list of people that have push access to this branch. This removes all people that previously had push access and grants push access to the new list of people.</p> 
         <table>
          <thead>
           <tr>
            <th>Type</th>
            <th>Description</th>
           </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody>
           <tr>
            <td><code>array</code></td>
            <td>Usernames for people who can have push access. <strong>Note</strong>: The list of users, apps, and teams in total is limited to 100 items.</td>
           </tr>
          </tbody>
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">put</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/branches/{branch}/protection/restrictions/users</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="set-user-access-restrictions--parameters"> <a href="#set-user-access-restrictions--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>branch</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>The name of the branch.</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>users</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">array of strings</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p><strong>Required</strong>. users parameter</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="set-user-access-restrictions--code-samples"> <a href="#set-user-access-restrictions--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4> 
         <h5> Shell </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -X PUT \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/branches/BRANCH/protection/restrictions/users</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'PUT /repos/{owner}/{repo}/branches/{branch}/protection/restrictions/users'</span>, {
  <span class="hljs-attr">owner</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'octocat'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">branch</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'branch'</span>
})
</code></pre> 
         <h4>Response</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 200 OK</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block">
          <pre><code class="hljs language-json">[
  {
    <span class="hljs-attr">"login"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"octocat"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"id"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"node_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"MDQ6VXNlcjE="</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"avatar_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/images/error/octocat_happy.gif"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"gravatar_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">""</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"html_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"followers_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/followers"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"following_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/following{/other_user}"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"gists_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/gists{/gist_id}"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"starred_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/starred{/owner}{/repo}"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"subscriptions_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/subscriptions"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"organizations_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/orgs"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"repos_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/repos"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"events_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/events{/privacy}"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"received_events_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/received_events"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"type"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"User"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"site_admin"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>
  }
]
</code></pre>
         </div> 
         <h4>Validation failed</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 422 Unprocessable Entity</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Notes</h4> 
         <ul class="mt-2"> 
          <li><a href="/en/developers/apps">Works with GitHub Apps</a></li> 
         </ul> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="remove-user-access-restrictions" class="pt-3"> <a href="#remove-user-access-restrictions">Remove user access restrictions</a> </h3> 
         <p>Protected branches are available in public repositories with GitHub Free and GitHub Free for organizations, and in public and private repositories with GitHub Pro, GitHub Team, GitHub Enterprise Cloud, and GitHub Enterprise Server. For more information, see <a href="https://help.github.com/github/getting-started-with-github/githubs-products">GitHub's products</a> in the GitHub Help documentation.</p> 
         <p>Removes the ability of a user to push to this branch.</p> 
         <table>
          <thead>
           <tr>
            <th>Type</th>
            <th>Description</th>
           </tr>
          </thead>
          <tbody>
           <tr>
            <td><code>array</code></td>
            <td>Usernames of the people who should no longer have push access. <strong>Note</strong>: The list of users, apps, and teams in total is limited to 100 items.</td>
           </tr>
          </tbody>
         </table> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">delete</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/branches/{branch}/protection/restrictions/users</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="remove-user-access-restrictions--parameters"> <a href="#remove-user-access-restrictions--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>branch</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>The name of the branch.</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>users</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">array of strings</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p><strong>Required</strong>. users parameter</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="remove-user-access-restrictions--code-samples"> <a href="#remove-user-access-restrictions--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4> 
         <h5> Shell </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -X DELETE \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/branches/BRANCH/protection/restrictions/users</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'DELETE /repos/{owner}/{repo}/branches/{branch}/protection/restrictions/users'</span>, {
  <span class="hljs-attr">owner</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'octocat'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">branch</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'branch'</span>
})
</code></pre> 
         <h4>Response</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 200 OK</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block">
          <pre><code class="hljs language-json">[
  {
    <span class="hljs-attr">"login"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"octocat"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"id"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"node_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"MDQ6VXNlcjE="</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"avatar_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/images/error/octocat_happy.gif"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"gravatar_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">""</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"html_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"followers_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/followers"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"following_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/following{/other_user}"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"gists_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/gists{/gist_id}"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"starred_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/starred{/owner}{/repo}"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"subscriptions_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/subscriptions"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"organizations_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/orgs"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"repos_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/repos"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"events_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/events{/privacy}"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"received_events_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/received_events"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"type"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"User"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"site_admin"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>
  }
]
</code></pre>
         </div> 
         <h4>Validation failed</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 422 Unprocessable Entity</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Notes</h4> 
         <ul class="mt-2"> 
          <li><a href="/en/developers/apps">Works with GitHub Apps</a></li> 
         </ul> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="rename-a-branch" class="pt-3"> <a href="#rename-a-branch">Rename a branch</a> </h3> 
         <p>Renames a branch in a repository.</p> 
         <p><strong>Note:</strong> Although the API responds immediately, the branch rename process might take some extra time to complete in the background. You won't be able to push to the old branch name while the rename process is in progress. For more information, see "<a href="https://docs.github.com/github/administering-a-repository/renaming-a-branch">Renaming a branch</a>".</p> 
         <p>The permissions required to use this endpoint depends on whether you are renaming the default branch.</p> 
         <p>To rename a non-default branch:</p> 
         <ul> 
          <li>Users must have push access.</li> 
          <li>GitHub Apps must have the <code>contents:write</code> repository permission.</li> 
         </ul> 
         <p>To rename the default branch:</p> 
         <ul> 
          <li>Users must have admin or owner permissions.</li> 
          <li>GitHub Apps must have the <code>administration:write</code> repository permission.</li> 
         </ul> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">post</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/branches/{branch}/rename</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="rename-a-branch--parameters"> <a href="#rename-a-branch--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>branch</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>The name of the branch.</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>new_name</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p><strong>Required</strong>. The new name of the branch.</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="rename-a-branch--code-samples"> <a href="#rename-a-branch--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4> 
         <h5> Shell </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -X POST \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/branches/BRANCH/rename \
  -d '{"new_name":"new_name"}'</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'POST /repos/{owner}/{repo}/branches/{branch}/rename'</span>, {
  <span class="hljs-attr">owner</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'octocat'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">branch</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'branch'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">new_name</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'new_name'</span>
})
</code></pre> 
         <h4>Response</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 201 Created</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block">
          <pre><code class="hljs language-json">{
  <span class="hljs-attr">"name"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"master"</span>,

    <span class="hljs-attr">"node_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"MDY6Q29tbWl0N2ZkMWE2MGIwMWY5MWIzMTRmNTk5NTVhNGU0ZDRlODBkOGVkZjExZA=="</span>,

      <span class="hljs-attr">"author"</span>: {

      <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"id"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">583231</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"login"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"octocat"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"node_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"MDQ6VXNlcjE="</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"html_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"followers_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/followers"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"following_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/following{/other_user}"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"gists_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/gists{/gist_id}"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"starred_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/starred{/owner}{/repo}"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"subscriptions_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/subscriptions"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"organizations_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/orgs"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"repos_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/repos"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"events_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/events{/privacy}"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"received_events_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/received_events"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"type"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"User"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"site_admin"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>
    },
    <span class="hljs-attr">"html_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat/Hello-World/commit/6dcb09b5b57875f334f61aebed695e2e4193db5e"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"comments_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/commits/6dcb09b5b57875f334f61aebed695e2e4193db5e/comments"</span>
  },
  <span class="hljs-attr">"_links"</span>: {
    <span class="hljs-attr">"html"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat/Hello-World/tree/master"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"self"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/branches/master"</span>
  },
  <span class="hljs-attr">"protected"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"protection"</span>: {
    <span class="hljs-attr">"required_status_checks"</span>: {
      <span class="hljs-attr">"enforcement_level"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"non_admins"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"contexts"</span>: [
        <span class="hljs-string">"ci-test"</span>,
        <span class="hljs-string">"linter"</span>
      ]
    }
  },
  <span class="hljs-attr">"protection_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/branches/master/protection"</span>
}
</code></pre>
         </div> 
         <h4>Forbidden</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 403 Forbidden</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Resource not found</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 404 Not Found</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Validation failed</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 422 Unprocessable Entity</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Notes</h4> 
         <ul class="mt-2"> 
          <li><a href="/en/developers/apps">Works with GitHub Apps</a></li> 
         </ul> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <h2 id="collaborators"><a href="#collaborators">Collaborators</a></h2> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="list-repository-collaborators" class="pt-3"> <a href="#list-repository-collaborators">List repository collaborators</a> </h3> 
         <p>For organization-owned repositories, the list of collaborators includes outside collaborators, organization members that are direct collaborators, organization members with access through team memberships, organization members with access through default organization permissions, and organization owners.</p> 
         <p>Team members will include the members of child teams.</p> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">get</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/collaborators</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="list-repository-collaborators--parameters"> <a href="#list-repository-collaborators--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>affiliation</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">query</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>Filter collaborators returned by their affiliation. Can be one of:<br> * <code>outside</code>: All outside collaborators of an organization-owned repository.<br> * <code>direct</code>: All collaborators with permissions to an organization-owned repository, regardless of organization membership status.<br> * <code>all</code>: All collaborators the authenticated user can see.</p> Default: <code>all</code> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>per_page</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">integer</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">query</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>Results per page (max 100).</p> Default: <code>30</code> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>page</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">integer</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">query</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>Page number of the results to fetch.</p> Default: <code>1</code> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="list-repository-collaborators--code-samples"> <a href="#list-repository-collaborators--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4> 
         <h5> Shell </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/collaborators</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'GET /repos/{owner}/{repo}/collaborators'</span>, {
  <span class="hljs-attr">owner</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'octocat'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>
})
</code></pre> 
         <h4>Response</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 200 OK</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block">
          <pre><code class="hljs language-json">[
  {
    <span class="hljs-attr">"login"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"octocat"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"id"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"node_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"MDQ6VXNlcjE="</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"avatar_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/images/error/octocat_happy.gif"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"gravatar_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">""</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"html_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"followers_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/followers"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"following_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/following{/other_user}"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"gists_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/gists{/gist_id}"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"starred_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/starred{/owner}{/repo}"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"subscriptions_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/subscriptions"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"organizations_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/orgs"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"repos_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/repos"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"events_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/events{/privacy}"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"received_events_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/received_events"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"type"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"User"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"site_admin"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"permissions"</span>: {
      <span class="hljs-attr">"pull"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"push"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"admin"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>
    }
  }
]
</code></pre>
         </div> 
         <h4>Resource not found</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 404 Not Found</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Notes</h4> 
         <ul class="mt-2"> 
          <li><a href="/en/developers/apps">Works with GitHub Apps</a></li> 
         </ul> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="check-if-a-user-is-a-repository-collaborator" class="pt-3"> <a href="#check-if-a-user-is-a-repository-collaborator">Check if a user is a repository collaborator</a> </h3> 
         <p>For organization-owned repositories, the list of collaborators includes outside collaborators, organization members that are direct collaborators, organization members with access through team memberships, organization members with access through default organization permissions, and organization owners.</p> 
         <p>Team members will include the members of child teams.</p> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">get</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/collaborators/{username}</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="check-if-a-user-is-a-repository-collaborator--parameters"> <a href="#check-if-a-user-is-a-repository-collaborator--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>username</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="check-if-a-user-is-a-repository-collaborator--code-samples"> <a href="#check-if-a-user-is-a-repository-collaborator--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4> 
         <h5> Shell </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/collaborators/USERNAME</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'GET /repos/{owner}/{repo}/collaborators/{username}'</span>, {
  <span class="hljs-attr">owner</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'octocat'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">username</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'username'</span>
})
</code></pre> 
         <h4>Response if user is a collaborator</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 204 No Content</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Not Found if user is not a collaborator</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 404 Not Found</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Notes</h4> 
         <ul class="mt-2"> 
          <li><a href="/en/developers/apps">Works with GitHub Apps</a></li> 
         </ul> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="add-a-repository-collaborator" class="pt-3"> <a href="#add-a-repository-collaborator">Add a repository collaborator</a> </h3> 
         <p>This endpoint triggers <a href="https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-subscriptions-and-notifications-on-github/about-notifications">notifications</a>. Creating content too quickly using this endpoint may result in abuse rate limiting. See "<a href="https://docs.github.com/rest/overview/resources-in-the-rest-api#abuse-rate-limits">Abuse rate limits</a>" and "<a href="https://docs.github.com/rest/guides/best-practices-for-integrators#dealing-with-rate-limits">Dealing with abuse rate limits</a>" for details.</p> 
         <p>For more information the permission levels, see "<a href="https://help.github.com/en/github/setting-up-and-managing-organizations-and-teams/repository-permission-levels-for-an-organization#permission-levels-for-repositories-owned-by-an-organization">Repository permission levels for an organization</a>".</p> 
         <p>Note that, if you choose not to pass any parameters, you'll need to set <code>Content-Length</code> to zero when calling out to this endpoint. For more information, see "<a href="https://docs.github.com/rest/overview/resources-in-the-rest-api#http-verbs">HTTP verbs</a>."</p> 
         <p>The invitee will receive a notification that they have been invited to the repository, which they must accept or decline. They may do this via the notifications page, the email they receive, or by using the <a href="https://docs.github.com/rest/reference/repos#invitations">repository invitations API endpoints</a>.</p> 
         <p><strong>Rate limits</strong></p> 
         <p>To prevent abuse, you are limited to sending 50 invitations to a repository per 24 hour period. Note there is no limit if you are inviting organization members to an organization repository.</p> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">put</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/collaborators/{username}</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="add-a-repository-collaborator--parameters"> <a href="#add-a-repository-collaborator--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>username</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>permission</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>The permission to grant the collaborator. <strong>Only valid on organization-owned repositories.</strong> Can be one of:<br> * <code>pull</code> - can pull, but not push to or administer this repository.<br> * <code>push</code> - can pull and push, but not administer this repository.<br> * <code>admin</code> - can pull, push and administer this repository.<br> * <code>maintain</code> - Recommended for project managers who need to manage the repository without access to sensitive or destructive actions.<br> * <code>triage</code> - Recommended for contributors who need to proactively manage issues and pull requests without write access.</p> Default: <code>push</code> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>permissions</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="add-a-repository-collaborator--code-samples"> <a href="#add-a-repository-collaborator--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4> 
         <h5> Shell </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -X PUT \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/collaborators/USERNAME \
  -d '{"permission":"permission"}'</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'PUT /repos/{owner}/{repo}/collaborators/{username}'</span>, {
  <span class="hljs-attr">owner</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'octocat'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">username</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'username'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">permission</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'permission'</span>
})
</code></pre> 
         <h4>Response when a new invitation is created</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 201 Created</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block">
          <pre><code class="hljs language-json">{
  <span class="hljs-attr">"id"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"node_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"MDEwOlJlcG9zaXRvcnkxMjk2MjY5"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"repository"</span>: {
    <span class="hljs-attr">"id"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1296269</span>,

    <span class="hljs-attr">"name"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"Hello-World"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"full_name"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"octocat/Hello-World"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"owner"</span>: {
      <span class="hljs-attr">"login"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"octocat"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"id"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"node_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"MDQ6VXNlcjE="</span>,

      <span class="hljs-attr">"gists_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/gists{/gist_id}"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"starred_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/starred{/owner}{/repo}"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"subscriptions_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/subscriptions"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"organizations_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/orgs"</span>,

      <span class="hljs-attr">"site_admin"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>
    },
    <span class="hljs-attr">"private"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"html_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat/Hello-World"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"description"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"This your first repo!"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"fork"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"archive_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/{archive_format}{/ref}"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"assignees_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/assignees{/user}"</span>,

  <span class="hljs-attr">"html_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat/Hello-World/invitations"</span>
}
</code></pre>
         </div> 
         <h4>Response when person is already a collaborator</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 204 No Content</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Forbidden</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 403 Forbidden</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Validation failed</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 422 Unprocessable Entity</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Notes</h4> 
         <ul class="mt-2"> 
          <li><a href="/en/developers/apps">Works with GitHub Apps</a></li> 
         </ul> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="remove-a-repository-collaborator" class="pt-3"> <a href="#remove-a-repository-collaborator">Remove a repository collaborator</a> </h3> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">delete</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/collaborators/{username}</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="remove-a-repository-collaborator--parameters"> <a href="#remove-a-repository-collaborator--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>username</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="remove-a-repository-collaborator--code-samples"> <a href="#remove-a-repository-collaborator--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4> 
         <h5> Shell </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -X DELETE \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/collaborators/USERNAME</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'DELETE /repos/{owner}/{repo}/collaborators/{username}'</span>, {
  <span class="hljs-attr">owner</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'octocat'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">username</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'username'</span>
})
</code></pre> 
         <h4>Response</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 204 No Content</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Notes</h4> 
         <ul class="mt-2"> 
          <li><a href="/en/developers/apps">Works with GitHub Apps</a></li> 
         </ul> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="get-repository-permissions-for-a-user" class="pt-3"> <a href="#get-repository-permissions-for-a-user">Get repository permissions for a user</a> </h3> 
         <p>Checks the repository permission of a collaborator. The possible repository permissions are <code>admin</code>, <code>write</code>, <code>read</code>, and <code>none</code>.</p> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">get</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/collaborators/{username}/permission</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="get-repository-permissions-for-a-user--parameters"> <a href="#get-repository-permissions-for-a-user--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>username</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="get-repository-permissions-for-a-user--code-samples"> <a href="#get-repository-permissions-for-a-user--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4> 
         <h5> Shell </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/collaborators/USERNAME/permission</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'GET /repos/{owner}/{repo}/collaborators/{username}/permission'</span>, {
  <span class="hljs-attr">owner</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'octocat'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">username</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'username'</span>
})
</code></pre> 
         <h4>if user has admin permissions</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 200 OK</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block">
          <pre><code class="hljs language-json">{
  <span class="hljs-attr">"permission"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"admin"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"user"</span>: {
    <span class="hljs-attr">"login"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"octocat"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"id"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"node_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"MDQ6VXNlcjE="</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"avatar_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/images/error/octocat_happy.gif"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"gravatar_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">""</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"html_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"followers_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/followers"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"following_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/following{/other_user}"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"gists_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/gists{/gist_id}"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"starred_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/starred{/owner}{/repo}"</span>,

    <span class="hljs-attr">"site_admin"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>

</code></pre>
         </div> 
         <h4>Resource not found</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 404 Not Found</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Notes</h4> 
         <ul class="mt-2"> 
          <li><a href="/en/developers/apps">Works with GitHub Apps</a></li>

        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <h2 id="comments"><a href="#comments">Comments</a></h2> 
       <h3 id="custom-media-types-for-commit-comments"><a href="#custom-media-types-for-commit-comments">Custom media types for commit comments</a></h3> 
       <p>These are the supported media types for commit comments. You can read more about the use of media types in the API <a href="/en/rest/overview/media-types">here</a>.</p> 
       <pre><code>application/vnd.github-commitcomment.raw+json
application/vnd.github-commitcomment.text+json
application/vnd.github-commitcomment.html+json
application/vnd.github-commitcomment.full+json
</code></pre> 
       <p>For more information, see "<a href="/en/rest/overview/media-types">Custom media types</a>."</p> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="list-commit-comments-for-a-repository" class="pt-3"> <a href="#list-commit-comments-for-a-repository">List commit comments for a repository</a> </h3> 
         <p>Commit Comments use <a href="https://docs.github.com/rest/reference/repos#custom-media-types">these custom media types</a>. You can read more about the use of media types in the API <a href="https://docs.github.com/rest/overview/media-types/">here</a>.</p> 
         <p>Comments are ordered by ascending ID.</p> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">get</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/comments</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="list-commit-comments-for-a-repository--parameters"> <a href="#list-commit-comments-for-a-repository--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. <a href="#list-commit-comments-for-a-repository-preview-notices"> See preview notice </a> </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>per_page</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">integer</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">query</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>Results per page (max 100).</p> Default: <code>30</code> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>page</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">integer</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">query</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>Page number of the results to fetch.</p> Default: <code>1</code> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="list-commit-comments-for-a-repository--code-samples"> <a href="#list-commit-comments-for-a-repository--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4> 
         <h5> Shell </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/comments</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'GET /repos/{owner}/{repo}/comments'</span>, {
  <span class="hljs-attr">owner</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'octocat'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>
})
</code></pre> 
         <h4>Response</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 200 OK</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block">
          <pre><code class="hljs language-json">[
  {
    <span class="hljs-attr">"html_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat/Hello-World/commit/6dcb09b5b57875f334f61aebed695e2e4193db5e#commitcomment-1"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/comments/1"</span>,

    <span class="hljs-attr">"commit_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"6dcb09b5b57875f334f61aebed695e2e4193db5e"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"user"</span>: {
      <span class="hljs-attr">"login"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"octocat"</span>,

      <span class="hljs-attr">"gists_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/gists{/gist_id}"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"starred_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/starred{/owner}{/repo}"</span>,

      <span class="hljs-attr">"events_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/events{/privacy}"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"received_events_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/received_events"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"type"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"User"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"site_admin"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>
    },
    <span class="hljs-attr">"created_at"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"2011-04-14T16:00:49Z"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"updated_at"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"2011-04-14T16:00:49Z"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"author_association"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"COLLABORATOR"</span>
  }
]
</code></pre>
         </div> 
         <h4>Notes</h4> 
         <ul class="mt-2"> 
          <li><a href="/en/developers/apps">Works with GitHub Apps</a></li> 
         </ul> 
         <h4 id="list-commit-comments-for-a-repository-preview-notices"> Preview notice </h4> 
         <div class="extended-markdown note border rounded-1 mb-4 p-3 color-border-info color-bg-info f5"> 
          <p>An additional <code>reactions</code> object in the issue comment payload is currently available for developers to preview. During the preview period, the APIs may change without advance notice. Please see the <a href="https://developer.github.com/changes/2016-05-12-reactions-api-preview">blog post</a> for full details.</p> 
          <p>To access the API you must provide a custom <a href="https://docs.github.com/rest/overview/media-types">media type</a> in the <code>Accept</code> header:</p> 
          <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">application/vnd.github.squirrel-girl-preview</code></pre> 
          <p>The <code>reactions</code> key will have the following payload where <code>url</code> can be used to construct the API location for <a href="https://docs.github.com/rest/reference/reactions">listing and creating</a> reactions.</p> 
         </div> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="get-a-commit-comment" class="pt-3"> <a href="#get-a-commit-comment">Get a commit comment</a> </h3> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">get</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/comments/{comment_id}</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="get-a-commit-comment--parameters"> <a href="#get-a-commit-comment--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. <a href="#get-a-commit-comment-preview-notices"> See preview notice </a> </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>comment_id</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">integer</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>comment_id parameter</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="get-a-commit-comment--code-samples"> <a href="#get-a-commit-comment--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4> 
         <h5> Shell </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/comments/42</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'GET /repos/{owner}/{repo}/comments/{comment_id}'</span>, {
  <span class="hljs-attr">owner</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'octocat'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">comment_id</span>: <span class="hljs-number">42</span>
})
</code></pre> 
         <h4>Response</h4>

          <p>An additional <code>reactions</code> object in the issue comment payload is currently available for developers to preview.           <p>To access the API you must provide a custom <a href="https://docs.github.com/rest/overview/media-types">media type</a> in the <code>Accept</code> header:</p> 
          <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">application/vnd.github.squirrel-girl-preview</code></pre> 
          <p>The <code>reactions</code> key will have the following payload where <code>url</code> can be used to construct the API location for <a href="https://docs.github.com/rest/reference/reactions">listing and creating</a> reactions.</p>

        <div> 
         <h3 id="update-a-commit-comment" class="pt-3"> <a href="#update-a-commit-comment">Update a commit comment</a> </h3> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">patch</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/comments/{comment_id}</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="update-a-commit-comment--parameters"> <a href="#update-a-commit-comment--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>comment_id</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">integer</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>comment_id parameter</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>body</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p><strong>Required</strong>. The contents of the comment</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="update-a-commit-comment--code-samples"> <a href="#update-a-commit-comment--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4> 
         <h5> Shell </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -X PATCH \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/comments/42 \
  -d '{"body":"body"}'</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'PATCH /repos/{owner}/{repo}/comments/{comment_id}'</span>, {
  <span class="hljs-attr">owner</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'octocat'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">comment_id</span>: <span class="hljs-number">42</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">body</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'body'</span>
})
</code></pre> 
         <h4>Response</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 200 OK</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block">
          <pre><code class="hljs language-json">{
  <span class="hljs-attr">"html_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat/Hello-World/commit/6dcb09b5b57875f334f61aebed695e2e4193db5e#commitcomment-1"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/comments/1"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"id"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"node_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"MDEzOkNvbW1pdENvbW1lbnQx"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"body"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"Nice change"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"path"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"file1.txt"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"position"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">4</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"line"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">14</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"commit_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"6dcb09b5b57875f334f61aebed695e2e4193db5e"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"author_association"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"COLLABORATOR"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"user"</span>: {
    <span class="hljs-attr">"login"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"octocat"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"id"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"node_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"MDQ6VXNlcjE="</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"avatar_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/images/error/octocat_happy.gif"</span>,

    <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"html_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"followers_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/followers"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"following_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/following{/other_user}"</span>,

    <span class="hljs-attr">"received_events_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/received_events"</span>,
