         </div> 
         <h4>Response if content is a symlink</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 200 OK</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block">
          <pre><code class="hljs language-json">{
  <span class="hljs-attr">"type"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"symlink"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"target"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"/path/to/symlink/target"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"size"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">23</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"name"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"some-symlink"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"path"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"bin/some-symlink"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"sha"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"452a98979c88e093d682cab404a3ec82babebb48"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octokit/octokit.rb/contents/bin/some-symlink"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"git_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octokit/octokit.rb/git/blobs/452a98979c88e093d682cab404a3ec82babebb48"</span>,

  <span class="hljs-attr">"download_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/octokit/octokit.rb/master/bin/some-symlink"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"_links"</span>: {
    <span class="hljs-attr">"git"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octokit/octokit.rb/git/blobs/452a98979c88e093d682cab404a3ec82babebb48"</span>,

    <span class="hljs-attr">"html"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/master/bin/some-symlink"</span>
  }
}
</code></pre>
         </div> 
         <h4>Response if content is a submodule</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 200 OK</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block">
          <pre><code class="hljs language-json">{
  <span class="hljs-attr">"type"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"submodule"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"submodule_git_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"git://github.com/jquery/qunit.git"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"size"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"name"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"qunit"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"path"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"test/qunit"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"sha"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"6ca3721222109997540bd6d9ccd396902e0ad2f9"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/jquery/jquery/contents/test/qunit?ref=master"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"git_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/jquery/qunit/git/trees/6ca3721222109997540bd6d9ccd396902e0ad2f9"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"html_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/jquery/qunit/tree/6ca3721222109997540bd6d9ccd396902e0ad2f9"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"download_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">null</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"_links"</span>: {
    <span class="hljs-attr">"git"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/jquery/qunit/git/trees/6ca3721222109997540bd6d9ccd396902e0ad2f9"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"self"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/jquery/jquery/contents/test/qunit?ref=master"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"html"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/jquery/qunit/tree/6ca3721222109997540bd6d9ccd396902e0ad2f9"</span>
  }
}
</code></pre>
         </div> 
         <h4>Found</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 302 Found</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Forbidden</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 403 Forbidden</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Resource not found</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 404 Not Found</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Notes</h4> 
         <ul class="mt-2"> 
          <li><a href="/en/developers/apps">Works with GitHub Apps</a></li> 
         </ul> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="create-or-update-file-contents" class="pt-3"> <a href="#create-or-update-file-contents">Create or update file contents</a> </h3> 
         <p>Creates a new file or replaces an existing file in a repository.</p> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">put</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/contents/{path}</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="create-or-update-file-contents--parameters"> <a href="#create-or-update-file-contents--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>path</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>path parameter</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>message</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p><strong>Required</strong>. The commit message.</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>content</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p><strong>Required</strong>. The new file content, using Base64 encoding.</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>sha</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p><strong>Required if you are updating a file</strong>. The blob SHA of the file being replaced.</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>branch</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>The branch name. Default: the repositorys default branch (usually <code>master</code>)</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>committer</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">object</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>The person that committed the file. Default: the authenticated user.</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr style="border: none;"> 
            <td colspan="4" class="has-nested-table"> 
             <details> <summary class="color-text-secondary"><h4 id="committer-object">Properties of the <code>committer</code> object</h4></summary> 
              <table> 
               <tbody> 
                <tr> 
                 <td class="opacity-60"><code>name</code> (string)</td> 
                 <td class="opacity-60"><p><strong>Required</strong>. The name of the author or committer of the commit. You'll receive a <code>422</code> status code if <code>name</code> is omitted.</p></td> 
                </tr> 
                <tr> 
                 <td class="opacity-60"><code>email</code> (string)</td> 
                 <td class="opacity-60"><p><strong>Required</strong>. The email of the author or committer of the commit. You'll receive a <code>422</code> status code if <code>email</code> is omitted.</p></td> 
                </tr> 
                <tr> 
                 <td class="opacity-60"><code>date</code> (string)</td> 
                 <td class="opacity-60"></td> 
                </tr> 
               </tbody> 
              </table> 
             </details> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>author</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">object</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>The author of the file. Default: The <code>committer</code> or the authenticated user if you omit <code>committer</code>.</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr style="border: none;"> 
            <td colspan="4" class="has-nested-table"> 
             <details> <summary class="color-text-secondary"><h4 id="author-object">Properties of the <code>author</code> object</h4></summary> 
              <table> 
               <tbody> 
                <tr> 
                 <td class="opacity-60"><code>name</code> (string)</td> 
                 <td class="opacity-60"><p><strong>Required</strong>. The name of the author or committer of the commit. You'll receive a <code>422</code> status code if <code>name</code> is omitted.</p></td> 
                </tr> 
                <tr> 
                 <td class="opacity-60"><code>email</code> (string)</td> 
                 <td class="opacity-60"><p><strong>Required</strong>. The email of the author or committer of the commit. You'll receive a <code>422</code> status code if <code>email</code> is omitted.</p></td> 
                </tr> 
                <tr> 
                 <td class="opacity-60"><code>date</code> (string)</td> 
                 <td class="opacity-60"></td> 
                </tr> 
               </tbody> 
              </table> 
             </details> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="create-or-update-file-contents--code-samples"> <a href="#create-or-update-file-contents--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4> 
         <h5> Shell </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -X PUT \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/contents/PATH \
  -d '{"message":"message","content":"content"}'</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'PUT /repos/{owner}/{repo}/contents/{path}'</span>, {
  <span class="hljs-attr">owner</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'octocat'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">path</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'path'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">message</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'message'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">content</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'content'</span>
})
</code></pre> 
         <h4>Response</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 200 OK</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block">
          <pre><code class="hljs language-json">{
  <span class="hljs-attr">"content"</span>: {
    <span class="hljs-attr">"name"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"hello.txt"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"path"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"notes/hello.txt"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"sha"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"a56507ed892d05a37c6d6128c260937ea4d287bd"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"size"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">9</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/contents/notes/hello.txt"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"html_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat/Hello-World/blob/master/notes/hello.txt"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"git_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/git/blobs/a56507ed892d05a37c6d6128c260937ea4d287bd"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"download_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/octocat/HelloWorld/master/notes/hello.txt"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"type"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"file"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"_links"</span>: {
      <span class="hljs-attr">"self"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/contents/notes/hello.txt"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"git"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/git/blobs/a56507ed892d05a37c6d6128c260937ea4d287bd"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"html"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat/Hello-World/blob/master/notes/hello.txt"</span>
    }
  },
  <span class="hljs-attr">"commit"</span>: {
    <span class="hljs-attr">"sha"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"18a43cd8e1e3a79c786e3d808a73d23b6d212b16"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"node_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"MDY6Q29tbWl0MThhNDNjZDhlMWUzYTc5Yzc4NmUzZDgwOGE3M2QyM2I2ZDIxMmIxNg=="</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/git/commits/18a43cd8e1e3a79c786e3d808a73d23b6d212b16"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"html_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat/Hello-World/git/commit/18a43cd8e1e3a79c786e3d808a73d23b6d212b16"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"author"</span>: {
      <span class="hljs-attr">"date"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"2014-11-07T22:01:45Z"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"name"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"Monalisa Octocat"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"email"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"octocat@github.com"</span>
    },
    <span class="hljs-attr">"committer"</span>: {
      <span class="hljs-attr">"date"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"2014-11-07T22:01:45Z"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"name"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"Monalisa Octocat"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"email"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"octocat@github.com"</span>
    },
    <span class="hljs-attr">"message"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"my commit message"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"tree"</span>: {
      <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/git/trees/9a21f8e2018f42ffcf369b24d2cd20bc25c9e66f"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"sha"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"9a21f8e2018f42ffcf369b24d2cd20bc25c9e66f"</span>
    },
    <span class="hljs-attr">"parents"</span>: [
      {
        <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/git/commits/da5a433788da5c255edad7979b328b67d79f53f6"</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"html_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat/Hello-World/git/commit/da5a433788da5c255edad7979b328b67d79f53f6"</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"sha"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"da5a433788da5c255edad7979b328b67d79f53f6"</span>
      }
    ],
    <span class="hljs-attr">"verification"</span>: {
      <span class="hljs-attr">"verified"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"reason"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"unsigned"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"signature"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">null</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"payload"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">null</span>
    }
  }
}
</code></pre>
         </div> 
         <h4>Response</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 201 Created</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block">
          <pre><code class="hljs language-json">{
  <span class="hljs-attr">"content"</span>: {
    <span class="hljs-attr">"name"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"hello.txt"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"path"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"notes/hello.txt"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"sha"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"95b966ae1c166bd92f8ae7d1c313e738c731dfc3"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"size"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">9</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/contents/notes/hello.txt"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"html_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat/Hello-World/blob/master/notes/hello.txt"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"git_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/git/blobs/95b966ae1c166bd92f8ae7d1c313e738c731dfc3"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"download_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/octocat/HelloWorld/master/notes/hello.txt"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"type"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"file"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"_links"</span>: {
      <span class="hljs-attr">"self"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/contents/notes/hello.txt"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"git"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/git/blobs/95b966ae1c166bd92f8ae7d1c313e738c731dfc3"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"html"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat/Hello-World/blob/master/notes/hello.txt"</span>
    }
  },
  <span class="hljs-attr">"commit"</span>: {
    <span class="hljs-attr">"sha"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"7638417db6d59f3c431d3e1f261cc637155684cd"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"node_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"MDY6Q29tbWl0NzYzODQxN2RiNmQ1OWYzYzQzMWQzZTFmMjYxY2M2MzcxNTU2ODRjZA=="</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/git/commits/7638417db6d59f3c431d3e1f261cc637155684cd"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"html_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat/Hello-World/git/commit/7638417db6d59f3c431d3e1f261cc637155684cd"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"author"</span>: {
      <span class="hljs-attr">"date"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"2014-11-07T22:01:45Z"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"name"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"Monalisa Octocat"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"email"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"octocat@github.com"</span>
    },
    <span class="hljs-attr">"committer"</span>: {
      <span class="hljs-attr">"date"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"2014-11-07T22:01:45Z"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"name"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"Monalisa Octocat"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"email"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"octocat@github.com"</span>
    },
    <span class="hljs-attr">"message"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"my commit message"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"tree"</span>: {
      <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/git/trees/691272480426f78a0138979dd3ce63b77f706feb"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"sha"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"691272480426f78a0138979dd3ce63b77f706feb"</span>
    },
    <span class="hljs-attr">"parents"</span>: [
      {
        <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/git/commits/1acc419d4d6a9ce985db7be48c6349a0475975b5"</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"html_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat/Hello-World/git/commit/1acc419d4d6a9ce985db7be48c6349a0475975b5"</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"sha"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"1acc419d4d6a9ce985db7be48c6349a0475975b5"</span>
      }
    ],
    <span class="hljs-attr">"verification"</span>: {
      <span class="hljs-attr">"verified"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"reason"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"unsigned"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"signature"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">null</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"payload"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">null</span>
    }
  }
}
</code></pre>
         </div> 
         <h4>Resource not found</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 404 Not Found</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Conflict</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 409 Conflict</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Validation failed</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 422 Unprocessable Entity</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Notes</h4> 
         <ul class="mt-2"> 
          <li><a href="/en/developers/apps">Works with GitHub Apps</a></li> 
         </ul> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="delete-a-file" class="pt-3"> <a href="#delete-a-file">Delete a file</a> </h3> 
         <p>Deletes a file in a repository.</p> 
         <p>You can provide an additional <code>committer</code> parameter, which is an object containing information about the committer. Or, you can provide an <code>author</code> parameter, which is an object containing information about the author.</p> 
         <p>The <code>author</code> section is optional and is filled in with the <code>committer</code> information if omitted. If the <code>committer</code> information is omitted, the authenticated user's information is used.</p> 
         <p>You must provide values for both <code>name</code> and <code>email</code>, whether you choose to use <code>author</code> or <code>committer</code>. Otherwise, you'll receive a <code>422</code> status code.</p> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">delete</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/contents/{path}</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="delete-a-file--parameters"> <a href="#delete-a-file--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>path</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>path parameter</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>message</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p><strong>Required</strong>. The commit message.</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>sha</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p><strong>Required</strong>. The blob SHA of the file being replaced.</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>branch</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>The branch name. Default: the repositorys default branch (usually <code>master</code>)</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>committer</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">object</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>object containing information about the committer.</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr style="border: none;"> 
            <td colspan="4" class="has-nested-table"> 
             <details> <summary class="color-text-secondary"><h4 id="committer-object">Properties of the <code>committer</code> object</h4></summary> 
              <table> 
               <tbody> 
                <tr> 
                 <td class="opacity-60"><code>name</code> (string)</td> 
                 <td class="opacity-60"><p>The name of the author (or committer) of the commit</p></td> 
                </tr> 
                <tr> 
                 <td class="opacity-60"><code>email</code> (string)</td> 
                 <td class="opacity-60"><p>The email of the author (or committer) of the commit</p></td> 
                </tr> 
               </tbody> 
              </table> 
             </details> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>author</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">object</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>object containing information about the author.</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr style="border: none;"> 
            <td colspan="4" class="has-nested-table"> 
             <details> <summary class="color-text-secondary"><h4 id="author-object">Properties of the <code>author</code> object</h4></summary> 
              <table> 
               <tbody> 
                <tr> 
                 <td class="opacity-60"><code>name</code> (string)</td> 
                 <td class="opacity-60"><p>The name of the author (or committer) of the commit</p></td> 
                </tr> 
                <tr> 
                 <td class="opacity-60"><code>email</code> (string)</td> 
                 <td class="opacity-60"><p>The email of the author (or committer) of the commit</p></td> 
                </tr> 
               </tbody> 
              </table> 
             </details> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="delete-a-file--code-samples"> <a href="#delete-a-file--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4> 
         <h5> Shell </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -X DELETE \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/contents/PATH \
  -d '{"message":"message","sha":"sha"}'</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'DELETE /repos/{owner}/{repo}/contents/{path}'</span>, {
  <span class="hljs-attr">owner</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'octocat'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">path</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'path'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">message</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'message'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">sha</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'sha'</span>
})
</code></pre> 
         <h4>Response</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 200 OK</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block">
          <pre><code class="hljs language-json">{
  <span class="hljs-attr">"content"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">null</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"commit"</span>: {
    <span class="hljs-attr">"sha"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"7638417db6d59f3c431d3e1f261cc637155684cd"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"node_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"MDY6Q29tbWl0NzYzODQxN2RiNmQ1OWYzYzQzMWQzZTFmMjYxY2M2MzcxNTU2ODRjZA=="</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/git/commits/7638417db6d59f3c431d3e1f261cc637155684cd"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"html_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat/Hello-World/git/commit/7638417db6d59f3c431d3e1f261cc637155684cd"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"author"</span>: {
      <span class="hljs-attr">"date"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"2014-11-07T22:01:45Z"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"name"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"Monalisa Octocat"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"email"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"octocat@github.com"</span>
    },
    <span class="hljs-attr">"committer"</span>: {
      <span class="hljs-attr">"date"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"2014-11-07T22:01:45Z"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"name"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"Monalisa Octocat"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"email"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"octocat@github.com"</span>
    },
    <span class="hljs-attr">"message"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"my commit message"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"tree"</span>: {
      <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/git/trees/691272480426f78a0138979dd3ce63b77f706feb"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"sha"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"691272480426f78a0138979dd3ce63b77f706feb"</span>
    },
    <span class="hljs-attr">"parents"</span>: [
      {
        <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/git/commits/1acc419d4d6a9ce985db7be48c6349a0475975b5"</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"html_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat/Hello-World/git/commit/1acc419d4d6a9ce985db7be48c6349a0475975b5"</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"sha"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"1acc419d4d6a9ce985db7be48c6349a0475975b5"</span>
      }
    ],
    <span class="hljs-attr">"verification"</span>: {
      <span class="hljs-attr">"verified"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"reason"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"unsigned"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"signature"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">null</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"payload"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">null</span>
    }
  }
}
</code></pre>
         </div> 
         <h4>Resource not found</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 404 Not Found</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Conflict</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 409 Conflict</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div>

         <pre><code>Status: 422 Unprocessable Entity</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div>

         <pre><code>Status: 503 Service Unavailable</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="get-a-repository-readme" class="pt-3"> <a href="#get-a-repository-readme">Get a repository README</a> </h3> 
         <p>Gets the preferred README for a repository.</p> 
         <p>READMEs support <a href="https://docs.github.com/rest/reference/repos#custom-media-types">custom media types</a> for retrieving the raw content or rendered HTML.</p> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">get</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/readme</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="get-a-repository-readme--parameters"> <a href="#get-a-repository-readme--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>ref</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">query</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>The name of the commit/branch/tag. Default: the repositorys default branch (usually <code>master</code>)</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="get-a-repository-readme--code-samples"> <a href="#get-a-repository-readme--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4> 
         <h5> Shell </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/readme</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'GET /repos/{owner}/{repo}/readme'</span>, {
  <span class="hljs-attr">owner</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'octocat'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>
})
</code></pre> 
         <h4>Response</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 200 OK</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block">
          <pre><code class="hljs language-json">{
  <span class="hljs-attr">"type"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"file"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"encoding"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"base64"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"size"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">5362</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"name"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"README.md"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"path"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"README.md"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"content"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"encoded content ..."</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"sha"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"3d21ec53a331a6f037a91c368710b99387d012c1"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octokit/octokit.rb/contents/README.md"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"git_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octokit/octokit.rb/git/blobs/3d21ec53a331a6f037a91c368710b99387d012c1"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"html_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/master/README.md"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"download_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/octokit/octokit.rb/master/README.md"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"_links"</span>: {
    <span class="hljs-attr">"git"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octokit/octokit.rb/git/blobs/3d21ec53a331a6f037a91c368710b99387d012c1"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"self"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octokit/octokit.rb/contents/README.md"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"html"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/master/README.md"</span>
  }
}
</code></pre>
         </div> 
         <h4>Resource not found</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 404 Not Found</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Validation failed</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 422 Unprocessable Entity</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Notes</h4> 
         <ul class="mt-2"> 
          <li><a href="/en/developers/apps">Works with GitHub Apps</a></li> 
         </ul> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="get-a-repository-readme-for-a-directory" class="pt-3"> <a href="#get-a-repository-readme-for-a-directory">Get a repository README for a directory</a> </h3> 
         <p>Gets the README from a repository directory.</p> 
         <p>READMEs support <a href="https://docs.github.com/rest/reference/repos#custom-media-types">custom media types</a> for retrieving the raw content or rendered HTML.</p> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">get</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/readme/{dir}</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="get-a-repository-readme-for-a-directory--parameters"> <a href="#get-a-repository-readme-for-a-directory--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>dir</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>The alternate path to look for a README file</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>ref</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">query</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>The name of the commit/branch/tag. Default: the repositorys default branch (usually <code>master</code>)</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="get-a-repository-readme-for-a-directory--code-samples"> <a href="#get-a-repository-readme-for-a-directory--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4> 
         <h5> Shell </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/readme/DIR</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'GET /repos/{owner}/{repo}/readme/{dir}'</span>, {
  <span class="hljs-attr">owner</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'octocat'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">dir</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'dir'</span>
})
</code></pre> 
         <h4>Response</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 200 OK</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block">
          <pre><code class="hljs language-json">{
  <span class="hljs-attr">"type"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"file"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"encoding"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"base64"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"size"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">5362</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"name"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"README.md"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"path"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"README.md"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"content"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"encoded content ..."</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"sha"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"3d21ec53a331a6f037a91c368710b99387d012c1"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octokit/octokit.rb/contents/README.md"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"git_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octokit/octokit.rb/git/blobs/3d21ec53a331a6f037a91c368710b99387d012c1"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"html_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/master/README.md"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"download_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/octokit/octokit.rb/master/README.md"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"_links"</span>: {
    <span class="hljs-attr">"git"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octokit/octokit.rb/git/blobs/3d21ec53a331a6f037a91c368710b99387d012c1"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"self"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octokit/octokit.rb/contents/README.md"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"html"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octokit/octokit.rb/blob/master/README.md"</span>
  }
}
</code></pre>
         </div> 
         <h4>Resource not found</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 404 Not Found</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Validation failed</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 422 Unprocessable Entity</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Notes</h4> 
         <ul class="mt-2"> 
          <li><a href="/en/developers/apps">Works with GitHub Apps</a></li> 
         </ul> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="download-a-repository-archive-tar" class="pt-3"> <a href="#download-a-repository-archive-tar">Download a repository archive (tar)</a> </h3> 
         <p>Gets a redirect URL to download a tar archive for a repository. If you omit <code>:ref</code>, the repositorys default branch (usually <code>master</code>) will be used. Please make sure your HTTP framework is configured to follow redirects or you will need to use the <code>Location</code> header to make a second <code>GET</code> request. <strong>Note</strong>: For private repositories, these links are temporary and expire after five minutes.</p> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">get</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/tarball/{ref}</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="download-a-repository-archive-tar--parameters"> <a href="#download-a-repository-archive-tar--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>ref</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="download-a-repository-archive-tar--code-samples"> <a href="#download-a-repository-archive-tar--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4> 
         <h5> Shell </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/tarball/REF</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'GET /repos/{owner}/{repo}/tarball/{ref}'</span>, {
  <span class="hljs-attr">owner</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'octocat'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">ref</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'ref'</span>
})
</code></pre> 
         <h4>Response</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 302 Found</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Notes</h4> 
         <ul class="mt-2"> 
          <li><a href="/en/developers/apps">Works with GitHub Apps</a></li> 
         </ul> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="download-a-repository-archive-zip" class="pt-3"> <a href="#download-a-repository-archive-zip">Download a repository archive (zip)</a> </h3> 
         <p>Gets a redirect URL to download a zip archive for a repository. If you omit <code>:ref</code>, the repositorys default branch (usually <code>master</code>) will be used. Please make sure your HTTP framework is configured to follow redirects or you will need to use the <code>Location</code> header to make a second <code>GET</code> request. <strong>Note</strong>: For private repositories, these links are temporary and expire after five minutes.</p> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">get</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/zipball/{ref}</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="download-a-repository-archive-zip--parameters"> <a href="#download-a-repository-archive-zip--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>ref</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="download-a-repository-archive-zip--code-samples"> <a href="#download-a-repository-archive-zip--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4>

         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/zipball/REF</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'GET /repos/{owner}/{repo}/zipball/{ref}'</span>, {
  <span class="hljs-attr">owner</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'octocat'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">ref</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'ref'</span>
})
</code></pre> 
         <h4>Response</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 302 Found</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Notes</h4> 
         <ul class="mt-2"> 
          <li><a href="/en/developers/apps">Works with GitHub Apps</a></li> 
         </ul> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <h2 id="deploy-keys"><a href="#deploy-keys">Deploy keys</a></h2> 
       <p>You can launch projects from a GitHub repository to your server by using a deploy key, which is an SSH key that grants access to a single repository. GitHub attaches the public part of the key directly to your repository instead of a personal user account, and the private part of the key remains on your server. For more information, see "<a href="/en/rest/guides/delivering-deployments">Delivering deployments</a>."</p> 
       <p>Deploy keys can either be setup using the following API endpoints, or by using GitHub. To learn how to set deploy keys up in GitHub, see "<a href="/en/developers/overview/managing-deploy-keys">Managing deploy keys</a>."</p> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="list-deploy-keys" class="pt-3"> <a href="#list-deploy-keys">List deploy keys</a> </h3> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">get</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/keys</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="list-deploy-keys--parameters"> <a href="#list-deploy-keys--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>per_page</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">integer</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">query</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>Results per page (max 100).</p> Default: <code>30</code> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>page</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">integer</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">query</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>Page number of the results to fetch.</p> Default: <code>1</code> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="list-deploy-keys--code-samples"> <a href="#list-deploy-keys--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4> 
         <h5> Shell </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/keys</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'GET /repos/{owner}/{repo}/keys'</span>, {
  <span class="hljs-attr">owner</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'octocat'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>
})
</code></pre> 
         <h4>Response</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 200 OK</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block">
          <pre><code class="hljs language-json">[
  {
    <span class="hljs-attr">"id"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"key"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"ssh-rsa AAA..."</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/keys/1"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"title"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"octocat@octomac"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"verified"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"created_at"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"2014-12-10T15:53:42Z"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"read_only"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>
  }
]
</code></pre>
         </div> 
         <h4>Notes</h4> 
         <ul class="mt-2"> 
          <li><a href="/en/developers/apps">Works with GitHub Apps</a></li> 
         </ul> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="create-a-deploy-key" class="pt-3"> <a href="#create-a-deploy-key">Create a deploy key</a> </h3> 
         <p>You can create a read-only deploy key.</p> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">post</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/keys</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="create-a-deploy-key--parameters"> <a href="#create-a-deploy-key--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>title</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>A name for the key.</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>key</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p><strong>Required</strong>. The contents of the key.</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>read_only</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">boolean</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>If <code>true</code>, the key will only be able to read repository contents. Otherwise, the key will be able to read and write. </p> <p>Deploy keys with write access can perform the same actions as an organization member with admin access, or a collaborator on a personal repository. For more information, see "<a href="https://help.github.com/articles/repository-permission-levels-for-an-organization/">Repository permission levels for an organization</a>" and "<a href="https://help.github.com/articles/permission-levels-for-a-user-account-repository/">Permission levels for a user account repository</a>."</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="create-a-deploy-key--code-samples"> <a href="#create-a-deploy-key--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4> 
         <h5> Shell </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -X POST \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/keys \
  -d '{"key":"key"}'</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'POST /repos/{owner}/{repo}/keys'</span>, {
  <span class="hljs-attr">owner</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'octocat'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">key</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'key'</span>
})
</code></pre> 
         <h4>Response</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 201 Created</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block">
          <pre><code class="hljs language-json">{
  <span class="hljs-attr">"id"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"key"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"ssh-rsa AAA..."</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/keys/1"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"title"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"octocat@octomac"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"verified"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"created_at"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"2014-12-10T15:53:42Z"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"read_only"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>
}
</code></pre>
         </div> 
         <h4>Validation failed</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 422 Unprocessable Entity</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Notes</h4> 
         <ul class="mt-2"> 
          <li><a href="/en/developers/apps">Works with GitHub Apps</a></li> 
         </ul> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="get-a-deploy-key" class="pt-3"> <a href="#get-a-deploy-key">Get a deploy key</a> </h3> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">get</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/keys/{key_id}</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="get-a-deploy-key--parameters"> <a href="#get-a-deploy-key--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>key_id</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">integer</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>key_id parameter</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="get-a-deploy-key--code-samples"> <a href="#get-a-deploy-key--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4> 
         <h5> Shell </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/keys/42</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'GET /repos/{owner}/{repo}/keys/{key_id}'</span>, {
  <span class="hljs-attr">owner</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'octocat'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">key_id</span>: <span class="hljs-number">42</span>
})
</code></pre> 
         <h4>Response</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 200 OK</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block">
          <pre><code class="hljs language-json">{
  <span class="hljs-attr">"id"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"key"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"ssh-rsa AAA..."</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/keys/1"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"title"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"octocat@octomac"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"verified"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"created_at"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"2014-12-10T15:53:42Z"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"read_only"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">true</span>
}
</code></pre>
         </div> 
         <h4>Resource not found</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 404 Not Found</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Notes</h4> 
         <ul class="mt-2"> 
          <li><a href="/en/developers/apps">Works with GitHub Apps</a></li> 
         </ul> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="delete-a-deploy-key" class="pt-3"> <a href="#delete-a-deploy-key">Delete a deploy key</a> </h3> 
         <p>Deploy keys are immutable. If you need to update a key, remove the key and create a new one instead.</p> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">delete</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/keys/{key_id}</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="delete-a-deploy-key--parameters"> <a href="#delete-a-deploy-key--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>key_id</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">integer</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>key_id parameter</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="delete-a-deploy-key--code-samples"> <a href="#delete-a-deploy-key--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4> 
         <h5> Shell </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -X DELETE \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/keys/42</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'DELETE /repos/{owner}/{repo}/keys/{key_id}'</span>, {
  <span class="hljs-attr">owner</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'octocat'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">key_id</span>: <span class="hljs-number">42</span>
})
</code></pre> 
         <h4>Response</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 204 No Content</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Notes</h4> 
         <ul class="mt-2"> 
          <li><a href="/en/developers/apps">Works with GitHub Apps</a></li> 
         </ul> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <h2 id="deployments"><a href="#deployments">Deployments</a></h2> 
       <p>Deployments are requests to deploy a specific ref (branch, SHA, tag). GitHub dispatches a <a href="/en/developers/webhooks-and-events/webhook-events-and-payloads#deployment"><code>deployment</code> event</a> that external services can listen for and act on when new deployments are created. Deployments enable developers and organizations to build loosely coupled tooling around deployments, without having to worry about the implementation details of delivering different types of applications (e.g., web, native).</p> 
       <p>Deployment statuses allow external services to mark deployments with an <code>error</code>, <code>failure</code>, <code>pending</code>, <code>in_progress</code>, <code>queued</code>, or <code>success</code> state that systems listening to <a href="/en/developers/webhooks-and-events/webhook-events-and-payloads#deployment_status"><code>deployment_status</code> events</a> can consume.</p> 
       <p>Deployment statuses can also include an optional <code>description</code> and <code>log_url</code>, which are highly recommended because they make deployment statuses more useful. The <code>log_url</code> is the full URL to the deployment output, and the <code>description</code> is a high-level summary of what happened with the deployment.</p> 
       <p>GitHub dispatches <code>deployment</code> and <code>deployment_status</code> events when new deployments and deployment statuses are created. These events allows third-party integrations to receive respond to deployment requests and update the status of a deployment as progress is made.</p> 
       <p>Below is a simple sequence diagram for how these interactions would work.</p> 
       <pre><code>+---------+             +--------+            +-----------+        +-------------+
| Tooling |             | GitHub |            | 3rd Party |        | Your Server |
+---------+             +--------+            +-----------+        +-------------+
     |                      |                       |                     |
     |  Create Deployment   |                       |                     |
     |---------------------&gt;|                       |                     |
     |                      |                       |                     |
     |  Deployment Created  |                       |                     |
     |&lt;---------------------|                       |                     |
     |                      |                       |                     |
     |                      |   Deployment Event    |                     |
     |                      |----------------------&gt;|                     |
     |                      |                       |     SSH+Deploys     |
     |                      |                       |--------------------&gt;|
     |                      |                       |                     |
     |                      |   Deployment Status   |                     |
     |                      |&lt;----------------------|                     |
     |                      |                       |                     |
     |                      |                       |   Deploy Completed  |
     |                      |                       |&lt;--------------------|
     |                      |                       |                     |
     |                      |   Deployment Status   |                     |
     |                      |&lt;----------------------|                     |
     |                      |                       |                     |
</code></pre> 
       <p>Keep in mind that GitHub is never actually accessing your servers. It's up to your third-party integration to interact with deployment events. Multiple systems can listen for deployment events, and it's up to each of those systems to decide whether they're responsible for pushing the code out to your servers, building native code, etc.</p> 
       <p>Note that the <code>repo_deployment</code> <a href="/en/developers/apps/scopes-for-oauth-apps">OAuth scope</a> grants targeted access to deployments and deployment statuses <strong>without</strong> granting access to repository code, while the <code>public_repo</code> and<code>repo</code> scopes grant permission to code as well.</p> 
       <h3 id="inactive-deployments"><a href="#inactive-deployments">Inactive deployments</a></h3> 
       <p>When you set the state of a deployment to <code>success</code>, then all prior non-transient, non-production environment deployments in the same repository to the same environment name will become <code>inactive</code>. To avoid this, you can set <code>auto_inactive</code> to <code>false</code> when creating the deployment status.</p> 
       <p>You can communicate that a transient environment no longer exists by setting its <code>state</code> to <code>inactive</code>. Setting the <code>state</code> to <code>inactive</code> shows the deployment as <code>destroyed</code> in GitHub and removes access to it.</p> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="list-deployments" class="pt-3"> <a href="#list-deployments">List deployments</a> </h3> 
         <p>Simple filtering of deployments is available via query parameters:</p> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">get</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/deployments</code></pre> 
        <div>
