         </div> 
         <h4>Resource not found</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 404 Not Found</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Notes</h4> 
         <ul class="mt-2"> 
          <li><a href="/en/developers/apps">Works with GitHub Apps</a></li> 
         </ul> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="create-a-release" class="pt-3"> <a href="#create-a-release">Create a release</a> </h3> 
         <p>Users with push access to the repository can create a release.</p> 
         <p>This endpoint triggers <a href="https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-subscriptions-and-notifications-on-github/about-notifications">notifications</a>. Creating content too quickly using this endpoint may result in abuse rate limiting. See "<a href="https://docs.github.com/rest/overview/resources-in-the-rest-api#abuse-rate-limits">Abuse rate limits</a>" and "<a href="https://docs.github.com/rest/guides/best-practices-for-integrators#dealing-with-rate-limits">Dealing with abuse rate limits</a>" for details.</p> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">post</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/releases</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="create-a-release--parameters"> <a href="#create-a-release--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>tag_name</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p><strong>Required</strong>. The name of the tag.</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>target_commitish</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>Specifies the commitish value that determines where the Git tag is created from. Can be any branch or commit SHA. Unused if the Git tag already exists. Default: the repository's default branch (usually <code>master</code>).</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>name</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>The name of the release.</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>body</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>Text describing the contents of the tag.</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>draft</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">boolean</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p><code>true</code> to create a draft (unpublished) release, <code>false</code> to create a published one.</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>prerelease</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">boolean</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p><code>true</code> to identify the release as a prerelease. <code>false</code> to identify the release as a full release.</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>discussion_category_name</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>If specified, a discussion of the specified category is created and linked to the release. The value must be a category that already exists in the repository. For more information, see "<a href="https://docs.github.com/discussions/managing-discussions-for-your-community/managing-categories-for-discussions-in-your-repository">Managing categories for discussions in your repository</a>."</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="create-a-release--code-samples"> <a href="#create-a-release--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4> 
         <h5> Shell </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -X POST \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/releases \
  -d '{"tag_name":"tag_name"}'</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'POST /repos/{owner}/{repo}/releases'</span>, {
  <span class="hljs-attr">owner</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'octocat'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">tag_name</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'tag_name'</span>
})
</code></pre> 
         <h4>Response</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 201 Created</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block">
          <pre><code class="hljs language-json">{
  <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/releases/1"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"html_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat/Hello-World/releases/v1.0.0"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"assets_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/releases/1/assets"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"upload_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://uploads.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/releases/1/assets{?name,label}"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"tarball_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/tarball/v1.0.0"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"zipball_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/zipball/v1.0.0"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"discussion_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat/Hello-World/discussions/90"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"id"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"node_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"MDc6UmVsZWFzZTE="</span>,

  <span class="hljs-attr">"author"</span>: {
    <span class="hljs-attr">"login"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"octocat"</span>,

    <span class="hljs-attr">"gravatar_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">""</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"html_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"followers_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/followers"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"following_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/following{/other_user}"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"gists_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/gists{/gist_id}"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"starred_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/starred{/owner}{/repo}"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"subscriptions_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/subscriptions"</span>,

</code></pre>
         </div> 
         <h4>Not Found if the discussion category name is invalid</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 404 Not Found</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Validation failed</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 422 Unprocessable Entity</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Notes</h4> 
         <ul class="mt-2"> 
          <li><a href="/en/developers/apps">Works with GitHub Apps</a></li> 
         </ul> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="get-a-release-asset" class="pt-3"> <a href="#get-a-release-asset">Get a release asset</a> </h3> 
         <p>To download the asset's binary content, set the <code>Accept</code> header of the request to <a href="https://docs.github.com/rest/overview/media-types"><code>application/octet-stream</code></a>. The API will either redirect the client to the location, or stream it directly if possible. API clients should handle both a <code>200</code> or <code>302</code> response.</p> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">get</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/releases/assets/{asset_id}</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="get-a-release-asset--parameters"> <a href="#get-a-release-asset--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>asset_id</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">integer</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>asset_id parameter</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="get-a-release-asset--code-samples"> <a href="#get-a-release-asset--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4> 
         <h5> Shell </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/releases/assets/42</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'GET /repos/{owner}/{repo}/releases/assets/{asset_id}'</span>, {
  <span class="hljs-attr">owner</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'octocat'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">asset_id</span>: <span class="hljs-number">42</span>
})
</code></pre> 
         <h4>To download the asset's binary content, set the `Accept` header of the request to [`application/octet-stream`](https://docs.github.com/rest/overview/media-types). The API will either redirect the client to the location, or stream it directly if possible. API clients should handle both a `200` or `302` response.</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 200 OK</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block">
          <pre><code class="hljs language-json">{
  <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/releases/assets/1"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"browser_download_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat/Hello-World/releases/download/v1.0.0/example.zip"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"id"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"node_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"MDEyOlJlbGVhc2VBc3NldDE="</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"name"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"example.zip"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"label"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"short description"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"state"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"uploaded"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"content_type"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"application/zip"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"size"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1024</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"download_count"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">42</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"created_at"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"2013-02-27T19:35:32Z"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"updated_at"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"2013-02-27T19:35:32Z"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"uploader"</span>: {
    <span class="hljs-attr">"login"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"octocat"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"id"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"node_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"MDQ6VXNlcjE="</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"avatar_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/images/error/octocat_happy.gif"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"gravatar_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">""</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"html_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"followers_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/followers"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"following_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/following{/other_user}"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"gists_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/gists{/gist_id}"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"starred_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/starred{/owner}{/repo}"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"subscriptions_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/subscriptions"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"organizations_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/orgs"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"repos_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/repos"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"events_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/events{/privacy}"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"received_events_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/received_events"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"type"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"User"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"site_admin"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>
  }
}
</code></pre>
         </div> 
         <h4>Found</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 302 Found</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Resource not found</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 404 Not Found</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Preview header missing</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 415 Unsupported Media Type</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Notes</h4> 
         <ul class="mt-2"> 
          <li><a href="/en/developers/apps">Works with GitHub Apps</a></li> 
         </ul> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="update-a-release-asset" class="pt-3"> <a href="#update-a-release-asset">Update a release asset</a> </h3> 
         <p>Users with push access to the repository can edit a release asset.</p> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">patch</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/releases/assets/{asset_id}</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="update-a-release-asset--parameters"> <a href="#update-a-release-asset--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>asset_id</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">integer</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>asset_id parameter</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>name</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>The file name of the asset.</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>label</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>An alternate short description of the asset. Used in place of the filename.</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>state</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="update-a-release-asset--code-samples"> <a href="#update-a-release-asset--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4> 
         <h5> Shell </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -X PATCH \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/releases/assets/42 \
  -d '{"name":"name"}'</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'PATCH /repos/{owner}/{repo}/releases/assets/{asset_id}'</span>, {
  <span class="hljs-attr">owner</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'octocat'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">asset_id</span>: <span class="hljs-number">42</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'name'</span>
})
</code></pre> 
         <h4>Response</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 200 OK</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block">
          <pre><code class="hljs language-json">{
  <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/releases/assets/1"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"browser_download_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat/Hello-World/releases/download/v1.0.0/example.zip"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"id"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"node_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"MDEyOlJlbGVhc2VBc3NldDE="</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"name"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"example.zip"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"label"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"short description"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"state"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"uploaded"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"content_type"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"application/zip"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"size"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1024</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"download_count"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">42</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"created_at"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"2013-02-27T19:35:32Z"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"updated_at"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"2013-02-27T19:35:32Z"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"uploader"</span>: {
    <span class="hljs-attr">"login"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"octocat"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"id"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"node_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"MDQ6VXNlcjE="</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"avatar_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/images/error/octocat_happy.gif"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"gravatar_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">""</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"html_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"followers_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/followers"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"following_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/following{/other_user}"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"gists_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/gists{/gist_id}"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"starred_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/starred{/owner}{/repo}"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"subscriptions_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/subscriptions"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"organizations_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/orgs"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"repos_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/repos"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"events_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/events{/privacy}"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"received_events_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/received_events"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"type"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"User"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"site_admin"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>
  }
}
</code></pre>
         </div> 
         <h4>Notes</h4> 
         <ul class="mt-2"> 
          <li><a href="/en/developers/apps">Works with GitHub Apps</a></li> 
         </ul> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="delete-a-release-asset" class="pt-3"> <a href="#delete-a-release-asset">Delete a release asset</a> </h3> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">delete</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/releases/assets/{asset_id}</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="delete-a-release-asset--parameters"> <a href="#delete-a-release-asset--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>asset_id</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">integer</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>asset_id parameter</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="delete-a-release-asset--code-samples"> <a href="#delete-a-release-asset--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4> 
         <h5> Shell </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -X DELETE \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/releases/assets/42</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'DELETE /repos/{owner}/{repo}/releases/assets/{asset_id}'</span>, {
  <span class="hljs-attr">owner</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'octocat'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">asset_id</span>: <span class="hljs-number">42</span>
})
</code></pre> 
         <h4>Response</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 204 No Content</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Notes</h4> 
         <ul class="mt-2"> 
          <li><a href="/en/developers/apps">Works with GitHub Apps</a></li> 
         </ul> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="get-the-latest-release" class="pt-3"> <a href="#get-the-latest-release">Get the latest release</a> </h3> 
         <p>View the latest published full release for the repository.</p> 
         <p>The latest release is the most recent non-prerelease, non-draft release, sorted by the <code>created_at</code> attribute. The <code>created_at</code> attribute is the date of the commit used for the release, and not the date when the release was drafted or published.</p> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">get</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/releases/latest</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="get-the-latest-release--parameters"> <a href="#get-the-latest-release--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="get-the-latest-release--code-samples"> <a href="#get-the-latest-release--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4> 
         <h5> Shell </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/releases/latest</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'GET /repos/{owner}/{repo}/releases/latest'</span>, {
  <span class="hljs-attr">owner</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'octocat'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>
})
</code></pre> 
         <h4>Response</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 200 OK</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block">
          <pre><code class="hljs language-json">{
  <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/releases/1"</span>,

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="get-a-release-by-tag-name" class="pt-3"> <a href="#get-a-release-by-tag-name">Get a release by tag name</a> </h3> 
         <p>Get a published release with the specified tag.</p> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">get</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/releases/tags/{tag}</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="get-a-release-by-tag-name--parameters"> <a href="#get-a-release-by-tag-name--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>tag</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>tag parameter</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="get-a-release-by-tag-name--code-samples"> <a href="#get-a-release-by-tag-name--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4> 
         <h5> Shell </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/releases/tags/TAG</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'GET /repos/{owner}/{repo}/releases/tags/{tag}'</span>, {
  <span class="hljs-attr">owner</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'octocat'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">tag</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'tag'</span>
})
</code></pre> 
         <h4>Response</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 200 OK</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block">
          <pre><code class="hljs language-json">{
  <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/releases/1"</span>,

      <span class="hljs-attr">"uploader"</span>: {
        <span class="hljs-attr">"login"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"octocat"</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"id"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"node_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"MDQ6VXNlcjE="</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"avatar_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/images/error/octocat_happy.gif"</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"gravatar_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">""</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat"</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"html_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat"</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"followers_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/followers"</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"following_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/following{/other_user}"</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"gists_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/gists{/gist_id}"</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"starred_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/starred{/owner}{/repo}"</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"subscriptions_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/subscriptions"</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"organizations_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/orgs"</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"repos_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/repos"</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"events_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/events{/privacy}"</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"received_events_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/received_events"</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"type"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"User"</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"site_admin"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>
      }
    }
  ]
}
</code></pre>
         </div> 
         <h4>Resource not found</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 404 Not Found</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Notes</h4> 
         <ul class="mt-2"> 
          <li><a href="/en/developers/apps">Works with GitHub Apps</a></li> 
         </ul> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="get-a-release" class="pt-3"> <a href="#get-a-release">Get a release</a> </h3> 
         <p><strong>Note:</strong> This returns an <code>upload_url</code> key corresponding to the endpoint for uploading release assets. This key is a <a href="https://docs.github.com/rest/overview/resources-in-the-rest-api#hypermedia">hypermedia resource</a>.</p> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">get</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/releases/{release_id}</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="get-a-release--parameters"> <a href="#get-a-release--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>release_id</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">integer</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>release_id parameter</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="get-a-release--code-samples"> <a href="#get-a-release--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4> 
         <h5> Shell </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/releases/42</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'GET /repos/{owner}/{repo}/releases/{release_id}'</span>, {
  <span class="hljs-attr">owner</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'octocat'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">release_id</span>: <span class="hljs-number">42</span>
})
</code></pre> 
         <h4>**Note:** This returns an `upload_url` key corresponding to the endpoint for uploading release assets. This key is a [hypermedia resource](https://docs.github.com/rest/overview/resources-in-the-rest-api#hypermedia).</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 200 OK</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block">
          <pre><code class="hljs language-json">{

         </div> 
         <h4>Resource not found</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 404 Not Found</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Notes</h4> 
         <ul class="mt-2"> 
          <li><a href="/en/developers/apps">Works with GitHub Apps</a></li> 
         </ul> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="update-a-release" class="pt-3"> <a href="#update-a-release">Update a release</a> </h3> 
         <p>Users with push access to the repository can edit a release.</p> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">patch</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/releases/{release_id}</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="update-a-release--parameters"> <a href="#update-a-release--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>release_id</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">integer</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>release_id parameter</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>tag_name</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>The name of the tag.</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>target_commitish</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>Specifies the commitish value that determines where the Git tag is created from. Can be any branch or commit SHA. Unused if the Git tag already exists. Default: the repository's default branch (usually <code>master</code>).</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>name</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>The name of the release.</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>body</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>Text describing the contents of the tag.</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>draft</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">boolean</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p><code>true</code> makes the release a draft, and <code>false</code> publishes the release.</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>prerelease</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">boolean</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p><code>true</code> to identify the release as a prerelease, <code>false</code> to identify the release as a full release.</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>discussion_category_name</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">body</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>If specified, a discussion of the specified category is created and linked to the release. The value must be a category that already exists in the repository. If there is already a discussion linked to the release, this parameter is ignored. For more information, see "<a href="https://docs.github.com/discussions/managing-discussions-for-your-community/managing-categories-for-discussions-in-your-repository">Managing categories for discussions in your repository</a>."</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="update-a-release--code-samples"> <a href="#update-a-release--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4> 
         <h5> Shell </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -X PATCH \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/releases/42 \
  -d '{"tag_name":"tag_name"}'</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'PATCH /repos/{owner}/{repo}/releases/{release_id}'</span>, {
  <span class="hljs-attr">owner</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'octocat'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">release_id</span>: <span class="hljs-number">42</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">tag_name</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'tag_name'</span>
})
</code></pre> 
         <h4>Response</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 200 OK</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block">
          <pre><code class="hljs language-json">{
  <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/releases/1"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"html_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat/Hello-World/releases/v1.0.0"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"assets_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/releases/1/assets"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"upload_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://uploads.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/releases/1/assets{?name,label}"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"tarball_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/tarball/v1.0.0"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"zipball_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/zipball/v1.0.0"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"discussion_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat/Hello-World/discussions/90"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"id"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"node_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"MDc6UmVsZWFzZTE="</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"tag_name"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"v1.0.0"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"target_commitish"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"master"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"name"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"v1.0.0"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"body"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"Description of the release"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"draft"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"prerelease"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"created_at"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"2013-02-27T19:35:32Z"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"published_at"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"2013-02-27T19:35:32Z"</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">"author"</span>: {
    <span class="hljs-attr">"login"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"octocat"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"id"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"node_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"MDQ6VXNlcjE="</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"avatar_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/images/error/octocat_happy.gif"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"gravatar_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">""</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"html_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"followers_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/followers"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"following_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/following{/other_user}"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"gists_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/gists{/gist_id}"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"starred_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/starred{/owner}{/repo}"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"subscriptions_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/subscriptions"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"organizations_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/orgs"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"repos_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/repos"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"events_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/events{/privacy}"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"received_events_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/received_events"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"type"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"User"</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"site_admin"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>
  },
  <span class="hljs-attr">"assets"</span>: [
    {
      <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/releases/assets/1"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"browser_download_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/octocat/Hello-World/releases/download/v1.0.0/example.zip"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"id"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"node_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"MDEyOlJlbGVhc2VBc3NldDE="</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"name"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"example.zip"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"label"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"short description"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"state"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"uploaded"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"content_type"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"application/zip"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"size"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1024</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"download_count"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">42</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"created_at"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"2013-02-27T19:35:32Z"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"updated_at"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"2013-02-27T19:35:32Z"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"uploader"</span>: {
        <span class="hljs-attr">"login"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"octocat"</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"id"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"node_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"MDQ6VXNlcjE="</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"avatar_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://github.com/images/error/octocat_happy.gif"</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"gravatar_id"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">""</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat"</span>,

        <span class="hljs-attr">"following_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/following{/other_user}"</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"gists_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/gists{/gist_id}"</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"starred_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/starred{/owner}{/repo}"</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"subscriptions_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/subscriptions"</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"organizations_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/orgs"</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"repos_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/repos"</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"events_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/events{/privacy}"</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"received_events_url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/users/octocat/received_events"</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"type"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"User"</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"site_admin"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>
      }
    }
  ]
}
</code></pre>
         </div> 
         <h4>Not Found if the discussion category name is invalid</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 404 Not Found</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Notes</h4> 
         <ul class="mt-2"> 
          <li><a href="/en/developers/apps">Works with GitHub Apps</a></li> 
         </ul>

       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="delete-a-release" class="pt-3"> <a href="#delete-a-release">Delete a release</a> </h3> 
         <p>Users with push access to the repository can delete a release.</p> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">delete</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/releases/{release_id}</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="delete-a-release--parameters"> <a href="#delete-a-release--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead>

            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead>

            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr>

            <td><code>release_id</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">integer</td>

           </tr> 
          </tbody>

  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>,

       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="upload-a-release-asset" class="pt-3"> <a href="#upload-a-release-asset">Upload a release asset</a> </h3> 
         <p>This endpoint makes use of <a href="https://docs.github.com/rest/overview/resources-in-the-rest-api#hypermedia">a Hypermedia relation</a> to determine which URL to access. The endpoint you call to upload release assets is specific to your release. Use the <code>upload_url</code> returned in the response of the <a href="https://docs.github.com/rest/reference/repos#create-a-release">Create a release endpoint</a> to upload a release asset.</p> 
         <p>You need to use an HTTP client which supports <a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Server_Name_Indication">SNI</a> to make calls to this endpoint.</p> 
         <p>Most libraries will set the required <code>Content-Length</code> header automatically. Use the required <code>Content-Type</code> header to provide the media type of the asset. For a list of media types, see <a href="https://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/media-types.xhtml">Media Types</a>. For example: </p> 
         <p><code>application/zip</code></p> 
         <p>GitHub expects the asset data in its raw binary form, rather than JSON. You will send the raw binary content of the asset as the request body. Everything else about the endpoint is the same as the rest of the API. For example, you'll still need to pass your authentication to be able to upload an asset.</p> 
         <p>When an upstream failure occurs, you will receive a <code>502 Bad Gateway</code> status. This may leave an empty asset with a state of <code>starter</code>. It can be safely deleted.</p> 
         <p><strong>Notes:</strong></p> 
         <ul> 
          <li>GitHub renames asset filenames that have special characters, non-alphanumeric characters, and leading or trailing periods. The "<a href="https://docs.github.com/rest/reference/repos#list-assets-for-a-release">List assets for a release</a>" endpoint lists the renamed filenames. For more information and help, contact <a href="https://support.github.com/contact">GitHub Support</a>.</li> 
          <li>If you upload an asset with the same filename as another uploaded asset, you'll receive an error and must delete the old file before you can re-upload the new asset.</li> 
         </ul> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">post</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/releases/{release_id}/assets</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="upload-a-release-asset--parameters"> <a href="#upload-a-release-asset--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>release_id</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">integer</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p>release_id parameter</p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>name</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">query</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>label</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">query</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="upload-a-release-asset--code-samples"> <a href="#upload-a-release-asset--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4> 
         <h5> Shell </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -X POST \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/releases/42/assets</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'POST /repos/{owner}/{repo}/releases/{release_id}/assets'</span>, {
  <span class="hljs-attr">owner</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'octocat'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">release_id</span>: <span class="hljs-number">42</span>
})
</code></pre> 
         <h4>Response for successful upload</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 201 Created</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block">
          <pre><code class="hljs language-json">{
  <span class="hljs-attr">"url"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/Hello-World/releases/assets/1"</span>,

         </div> 
         <h4>Notes</h4> 
         <ul class="mt-2"> 
          <li><a href="/en/developers/apps">Works with GitHub Apps</a></li> 
         </ul> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <h2 id="statistics"><a href="#statistics">Statistics</a></h2> 
       <p>The Repository Statistics API allows you to fetch the data that GitHub uses for visualizing different types of repository activity.</p> 
       <h3 id="a-word-about-caching"><a href="#a-word-about-caching">A word about caching</a></h3> 
       <p>Computing repository statistics is an expensive operation, so we try to return cached data whenever possible. If the data hasn't been cached when you query a repository's statistics, you'll receive a <code>202</code> response; a background job is also fired to start compiling these statistics. Give the job a few moments to complete, and then submit the request again. If the job has completed, that request will receive a <code>200</code> response with the statistics in the response body.</p> 
       <p>Repository statistics are cached by the SHA of the repository's default branch; pushing to the default branch resets the statistics cache.</p> 
       <h3 id="statistics-exclude-some-types-of-commits"><a href="#statistics-exclude-some-types-of-commits">Statistics exclude some types of commits</a></h3> 
       <p>The statistics exposed by the API match the statistics shown by <a href="/en/github/visualizing-repository-data-with-graphs/about-repository-graphs">different repository graphs</a>.</p> 
       <p>To summarize:</p> 
       <ul> 
        <li>All statistics exclude merge commits.</li> 
        <li>Contributor statistics also exclude empty commits.</li> 
       </ul> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="get-the-weekly-commit-activity" class="pt-3"> <a href="#get-the-weekly-commit-activity">Get the weekly commit activity</a> </h3> 
         <p>Returns a weekly aggregate of the number of additions and deletions pushed to a repository.</p> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">get</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/stats/code_frequency</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="get-the-weekly-commit-activity--parameters"> <a href="#get-the-weekly-commit-activity--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="get-the-weekly-commit-activity--code-samples"> <a href="#get-the-weekly-commit-activity--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4> 
         <h5> Shell </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/stats/code_frequency</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'GET /repos/{owner}/{repo}/stats/code_frequency'</span>, {
  <span class="hljs-attr">owner</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'octocat'</span>,
  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>
})
</code></pre> 
         <h4>Returns a weekly aggregate of the number of additions and deletions pushed to a repository.</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 200 OK</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block">
          <pre><code class="hljs language-json">[
  [
    <span class="hljs-number">1302998400</span>,
    <span class="hljs-number">1124</span>,
    <span class="hljs-number">-435</span>
  ]
]
</code></pre>
         </div> 
         <h4>Accepted</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 202 Accepted</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>A header with no content is returned.</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 204 No Content</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Notes</h4>

       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="get-the-last-year-of-commit-activity" class="pt-3"> <a href="#get-the-last-year-of-commit-activity">Get the last year of commit activity</a> </h3> 
         <p>Returns the last year of commit activity grouped by week. The <code>days</code> array is a group of commits per day, starting on <code>Sunday</code>.</p> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">get</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/stats/commit_activity</code></pre> 
        <div>

            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table>

       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="get-all-contributor-commit-activity" class="pt-3"> <a href="#get-all-contributor-commit-activity">Get all contributor commit activity</a> </h3> 
         <p>Returns the <code>total</code> number of commits authored by the contributor. In addition, the response includes a Weekly Hash (<code>weeks</code> array) with the following information:</p> 
         <ul> 
          <li><code>w</code> - Start of the week, given as a <a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unix_time">Unix timestamp</a>.</li> 
          <li><code>a</code> - Number of additions</li> 
          <li><code>d</code> - Number of deletions</li> 
          <li><code>c</code> - Number of commits</li> 
         </ul> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">get</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/stats/contributors</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="get-all-contributor-commit-activity--parameters"> <a href="#get-all-contributor-commit-activity--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="get-all-contributor-commit-activity--code-samples"> <a href="#get-all-contributor-commit-activity--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4> 
         <h5> Shell </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/stats/contributors</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'GET /repos/{owner}/{repo}/stats/contributors'</span>, {

  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>
})
</code></pre> 
         <h4>* `w` - Start of the week, given as a [Unix timestamp](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unix_time). * `a` - Number of additions * `d` - Number of deletions * `c` - Number of commits</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 200 OK</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block">
          <pre><code class="hljs language-json">[

      <span class="hljs-attr">"type"</span>: <span class="hljs-string">"User"</span>,
      <span class="hljs-attr">"site_admin"</span>: <span class="hljs-literal">false</span>
    },
    <span class="hljs-attr">"total"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">135</span>,
    <span class="hljs-attr">"weeks"</span>: [
      {
        <span class="hljs-attr">"w"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1367712000</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"a"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">6898</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"d"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">77</span>,
        <span class="hljs-attr">"c"</span>: <span class="hljs-number">10</span>
      }
    ]
  }
]
</code></pre>
         </div> 
         <h4>Accepted</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 202 Accepted</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>A header with no content is returned.</h4> 
         <pre><code>Status: 204 No Content</code></pre> 
         <div class="height-constrained-code-block"></div> 
         <h4>Notes</h4> 
         <ul class="mt-2"> 
          <li><a href="/en/developers/apps">Works with GitHub Apps</a></li> 
         </ul> 
        </div> 
        <hr> 
       </div> 
       <div> 
        <div> 
         <h3 id="get-the-weekly-commit-count" class="pt-3"> <a href="#get-the-weekly-commit-count">Get the weekly commit count</a> </h3> 
         <p>Returns the total commit counts for the <code>owner</code> and total commit counts in <code>all</code>. <code>all</code> is everyone combined, including the <code>owner</code> in the last 52 weeks. If you'd like to get the commit counts for non-owners, you can subtract <code>owner</code> from <code>all</code>.</p> 
         <p>The array order is oldest week (index 0) to most recent week.</p> 
        </div> 
        <pre><code><span class="color-bg-info-inverse color-text-inverse rounded-1 px-2 py-1" style="text-transform: uppercase">get</span> /repos/{owner}/{repo}/stats/participation</code></pre> 
        <div> 
         <h4 id="get-the-weekly-commit-count--parameters"> <a href="#get-the-weekly-commit-count--parameters">Parameters</a> </h4> 
         <table> 
          <thead> 
           <tr> 
            <th>Name</th> 
            <th>Type</th> 
            <th>In</th> 
            <th>Description</th> 
           </tr> 
          </thead> 
          <tbody> <!--
            Previews require an `accept` header. These used to be documented
            as `operation.parameters` but have moved to `operation.x-github.previews`
          --> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>accept</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">header</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> <p> Setting to <code>application/vnd.github.v3+json</code> is recommended. </p> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>owner</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
           <tr> 
            <td><code>repo</code></td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">string</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70">path</td> 
            <td class="opacity-70"> </td> 
           </tr> 
          </tbody> 
         </table> 
         <h4 id="get-the-weekly-commit-count--code-samples"> <a href="#get-the-weekly-commit-count--code-samples">Code samples</a> </h4> 
         <h5> Shell </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-shell">curl \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/octocat/hello-world/stats/participation</code></pre> 
         <h5> JavaScript (<a href="https://github.com/octokit/core.js#readme">@octokit/core.js</a>) </h5> 
         <pre><code class="hljs language-javascript"><span class="hljs-keyword">await</span> octokit.request(<span class="hljs-string">'GET /repos/{owner}/{repo}/stats/participation'</span>, {

  <span class="hljs-attr">repo</span>: <span class="hljs-string">'hello-world'</span>

</code></pre>
